channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLhealthAndWellness
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Grant funding disruptions affect one in 30 clinical trials
item.description: Grant funding disruptions affected about one in 30 trials, according to a research letter published online Nov. 17 in JAMA Internal Medicine.

item.title: A simple neck scan could detect men at high risk of heart failure
item.description: A simple neck scan can identify men with double the risk of heart failure, according to research led by University College London.

item.title: Diabetes linked to higher risk of complications after stent surgery
item.description: Patients with diabetes have an increased risk of complications after stent implantation, according to a study from Karolinska Institutet in Sweden pub...
